>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Valid Fixed-Width Markup

id:: td-000042

######################################################################

This document contains several examples of valid fixed-width markup.

One ||word|| is fixed-width in this sentence.

||This entire line is fixed-width.||

Only ||two words|| in this line are fixed-width.

This ||paragraph|| has several ||fixed-width|| words in ||it||.

<<<DOCUMENT
